alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LOUISA...NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN POWHATAN AND FLUVANNA COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ferncliff to near Fork Union to near Centenary. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fork Union, Columbia, Ferncliff, and Kents Store around 900 PM EDT. Duncan around 910 PM EDT. Fife and Lakeside Village around 920 PM EDT. Hadensville and Cartersville around 925 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Orchid, Rock Castle, Oak Forest, Three Square, Shores, Irwin, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Cohasset, and Whiteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Louisa
